summary: REQ-5 and REQ-7 appear implemented in the shown diffs (Hero has single CTA; How It Works numbers moved outside with gold/accent borders). REQ-6 (Our Approach card redesign details) cannot be fully verified due to truncation of AboutApproachSection rendering/styling code; some parts (icon swap) are evident, but required styling/interaction behaviors are not directly shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Our Approach cards: white background, permanent gold border using existing accent/gold theme token (no border color change on click), and on-click subtle upward-lift interaction that returns on release (desktop/mobile).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt for AboutApproachSection.tsx is truncated before the approach card JSX/classes are shown, so the required card background, border behavior across states, and click/tap lift interaction cannot be confirmed from the provided code.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded an "About Ayanda Mdluli Attorneys" firm overview section and a "Learn More" button navigating to /about within AboutApproachSection.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to redesign the existing "Our Approach" cards (numeric-to-icon swap, border/background styling, click-lift interaction). It does not request adding/changing an About/Firm Overview block or introducing a new Learn More CTA in that section.
